data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Falsoibidion Pic (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae) from Korea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lee, Seunghyun, Lee, Seunghwan (2016): A new species of the genus Falsoibidion Pic (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae) from Korea. ZooKeys 609: 63-68, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.609.8846, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.609.8846
